author: ObjectId_of_alice123
content: Running a seminar on making your own compost bin at the Stanmore Recreational Center on the 5th of November at 10am. Open for anyone to attend!!!

author: ObjectId_of_bob456
content: 1st Leichhardt Scout Group running a nature walk for young students. Non-scout members and parents are welcome to join. Meeting at Jellybean Track on the 10th of November at 8am
